# 6.0 Docs

> Documentation for 6.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 2*

- [Breaking change: Port removed from SPN for Kerberos and Negotiate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/6.0/httpclient-port-lookup.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where service principal names don't include a port component for Kerberos and Negotiate authentication.
- [Breaking change: WebRequest, WebClient, and ServicePoint are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/networking/6.0/webrequest-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where WebRequest, WebClient, and ServicePoint are deprecated in favor of HttpClient.
